original_title: Siouxsie and The Banshees: Live at Rockpalast
overview: Siouxsie and the Banshees performing at the Rockpalast, Cologne as part of their 1981 'Juju' tour.  Siouxsie Sioux: Voice and guitar  John McGeoch: Guitar  Steven Severin: Bass guitar  Budgie: Drums, percussion
title: Siouxsie and The Banshees: Live at Rockpalast
